languages.text: Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and is reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

languages.text: Die Trefferchance wird durch das Auspex des Schiffes bestimmt und durch das {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} des Ziels verringert.
languages.original_text: Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and is reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Trefferchance wird durch das Auspex des Schiffes bestimmt und durch das {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} des Ziels verringert.

languages.text: Les chances de toucher sont déterminées par l'auspex du vaisseau et réduites par l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g} de la cible.
languages.original_text: Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and is reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les chances d'infliger un coup sont déterminées par l'auspex du vaisseau et réduites par l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} de la cible.

languages.text: 武器的命中率由舰船装备的俄歇矩阵决定，还会受目标的{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}影响。
languages.original_text: Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and is reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 武器的命中率由舰船装备的俄歇矩阵决定，还会受目标的{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}影响。

languages.text: La probabilidad de impacto viene dada por el aúspex de la nave y queda reducida por la {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g} del objetivo.
languages.original_text: Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and is reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La probabilidad de impacto viene dada por el aúspex de la nave y queda reducida por la {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g} del objetivo.

languages.text: 命中率は船のアウスペクスにより決定し、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}により減少する。
languages.original_text: Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and is reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 命中率は船のアウスペクスにより決定し、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}により減少する。

languages.text: Вероятность попадания задается установленным на корабле ауспексом и уменьшается {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}уклонением{/g} цели.
languages.original_text: Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and is reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Вероятность попадания задается установленным на корабле ауспексом и уменьшается {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}уклонением{/g} цели.

languages.text: Vuruş olasılığı, geminin uzgörenine göre belirlenir ve hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} değerine bağlı olarak azalır.
languages.original_text: Hit chance is determined by the ship's auspex and is reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}.
